Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Shdmb24
Reviews.Content: Phones great. A better camera than I had anticipated. Only complaint is the keys click a little bit louder than I would like.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: dk
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my daughter around end of November as a Christmas present. It was a refurbished model and arrived in great condition. She has been using it and loves it. The only draw back is she is unable to get push mail to her phone due to only enterprise (corporate) is supported. However, the work around is Internet email. She can go to her gmail account and log in, click the "keep me logged in" box and save to bookmarks. After that she does not have to log in each time but goes directly to her mail quickly.I have purchased several unlocked phones from Amazon, some new, and some refurbished. All I do is put my Tmobile sim in them and I am ready to go. This phone was the same.

Reviews.Title: Giving trouble
Reviews.Author: BlackBerry Curve
Reviews.Content: I bought this item in December 2011. It was working ok for first 2-3 months. Then problem started. First with watching videos. It started to get switched off in 5-10 mins if I play Youtube on this.Then problem started with talktime. Now it get switched off if I talk more than 30 mins. Looking for a new phone now. Also this is not a great phone to do surfing ( even most basic things).

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Rubbish Product!!! Never Buy.
Reviews.Author: DKG
Reviews.Content: Ordered this item in NEW in first week of December 2012. When it arrived within a week, to my dismay, I discovered that the item was used. It had signs of usage on its body. When I removed its back cover, the inside was dusty, scratched and had clear signs of previous usage. Even the battery did not seem new. Furthermore, even the metal piece that is used to hold the SIM card in place was broken. Last but not the least, the charger was not an original Blackberry charger, but some cheap MADE IN CHINA product. I would never buy anything from AMAZON again.

Reviews.Title: with alot quantity some mobile come very bad
Reviews.Author: diego
Reviews.Content: my opinios is for seller recellulartoo, he always sold to my, but for the begining very good all is ok, but now when you bought quantity like 30 or 50 mobile always mobile the 10 or 15% come defective, for example usb, awful, if you want buy one is good, but if you want bouy 20 or 30 items.. you need to know that always 10 or 15% come damage or defective.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: allie1423
Reviews.Content: This is my first BlackBerry and overall I am loving it. I was worried at first about buying it online but it turned out ok. The phone works great and is outdoing my expectations. It may not be the fastest and I sometimes have to restart it but that is ok with me. It the first phone that I absolutely love and can see myself keeping it for a while and eventually getting another one.

Reviews.Title: don't buy this
Reviews.Author: David David "David David"
Reviews.Content: don't buy this, it sucks. don't buy this, it sucks. sucks, sucks, sucks, sucks, s, sucks, sucks, sucks, sucks, sucks.

Reviews.Title: Item condition is bad
Reviews.Author: coolgadget
Reviews.Content: The phone condition was bad when I open the back flip. I do accept it is pre owned however the condition is unacceptable.

Reviews.Title: Could have worked much longer
Reviews.Author: DJAYE
Reviews.Content: I've has this phone about one year and it cannot make voice calls. I have treated it well, no damage nor has it been exposed to any liquid substance.

Reviews.Title: Veri Good
Reviews.Author: Nestor Alfonzo
Reviews.Content: I am very satisfied with this article. No complaints so far. It works fine. I recommend it to anyone who needs a similar article.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: Misael Gomez
Reviews.Content: excelente servicio, me llego de una vez, son muy buenos y rápidos, los felicito, sigan adelante, tendrán muchas ventasmuchas gracias.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: AR
Reviews.Content: I definitely like this phone. It was bought as a gift and the recipient loves it. It works very good so far.

Reviews.Title: Maria Couto
Reviews.Author: Maria Andreina
Reviews.Content: A process very good, i am satisfied with the purchase. The product it's in good state and totally new, thak you

Reviews.Title: article in disrepair
Reviews.Author: Luisa fernanda
Reviews.Content: I really do not like the product because it does not work properly unfortunately I am not in the country so that it can return, so I lost my money.cordiallyLuisa Fernanda Rodriguez

Reviews.Title: buena elección
Reviews.Author: Mary Carmen Rojas Flores
Reviews.Content: Me parece un buen producto, accesible a la compra, ademas de ser una opción muy útil para quien se inicia con un BB. fue un proceso rápido y cómodo para la compra.
